title: Coastal Shell
description: A piece of shell from the Andalusian coast. After a harsh adventure on the seabed, this fragment of shell has found new life in theembrace of soft cotton.

title: Magic tree
description: Traces of a city built by bark beetles in the Siberian forests. The unique curves of the corridors are forever imprinted onthis piece of wood.

title: Sea Glass
description: Sea glass keychains from the Costa del Sol, Spain. When shards of a solid form become individuals and discover new combinations and life.

title: Bird Dances
description: Asymmetrical, lightweight quail feather earrings with stones and beads are able to catch every movement of the air.

title: Gray Moon
description: One of millions of coastal stones that absorb the energy of the sea and moon over the years. Transformed into a pendant, the stone will bestow its accumulated power.

title: Mollusk couple
description: The protective shell can be rough on the outside and shiny on the inside. The owners of these shells could well have been a couple.

title: Moon Land
description: There's nothing special about cement, just like the surface of the moonâ€” just dust. But in the light, this simplicity is transformed a hundredfold.

title: Domino Game
description: Italian game originated in China (surprising fact). But in this set, the stones were replaced with plastic. The rules remain the same as in the 18th century.

title: Indian
description: Every soul in the world is unique, and this piece of driftwood is no exception. Although in reality, it's bark that drifted through the ocean.

title: Forest Dreams
description: An Indian amulet, protector from nightmares. And may you dream of a green forest at sunset, when the summer sun gently touches the treetops.
